prompts.cover: A happy golden retriever named Sunshine sitting in a bright modern kitchen, looking excitedly at a bowl of fresh green broccoli florets in the foreground. The broccoli bowl is prominent, taking up 25% of the frame, positioned in the lower third. The dog is centered with a joyful expression, tongue out, smiling. Soft natural lighting from a window, clean white countertops. Top 25% of the image is clear for text overlay. Professional pet photography style, 8k quality, vibrant colors.
prompts.content_01: A golden retriever looking curious and happy at steamed broccoli florets on a white plate. The dog is tilting head slightly, ears perked up. Bright kitchen background with natural light. Close-up shot showing dog's excited expression. Professional pet food photography, warm tones.
prompts.content_02: A golden retriever with bright healthy coat sitting next to fresh broccoli. Visual metaphor for vitamin C and immunity. Sparkle effect around the broccoli. Dog looking healthy and energetic. Bright cheerful lighting, clean background.
prompts.content_03: A happy golden retriever near a bowl of chopped broccoli pieces. Focus on digestive health concept. Dog has content expression. Kitchen setting with wooden cutting board. Natural daylight, warm atmosphere.
prompts.content_04: A golden retriever looking youthful and vibrant next to broccoli florets with a subtle glow effect. Representing antioxidant benefits. Dog in playful pose. Modern kitchen background, professional lighting.
prompts.content_05: A golden retriever watching attentively as broccoli is being steamed in a pot. Educational angle showing cooking process. Steam rising gently. Dog waiting patiently. Kitchen scene, warm lighting.
prompts.content_06: A golden retriever sitting politely next to a small measured portion of broccoli (1-2 florets). Portion control visual. Dog looking satisfied. Clean white background with subtle kitchen elements. Professional pet photography.
